entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 23 except 17 near Lake Ontario.

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
